duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize medical background and experience to authorize requested services and determine level of care.
Review complex clinical scenarios and prioritize daily work based on clinical records.
Communicate decisions to internal associates and collaborators based on national guidelines and policies.
Provide medical interpretation and collaborate with team members and other healthcare professionals.
Operationalize knowledge of Commercial, Medicaid, Medicare, and Medicare Advantage requirements in daily work.
Manage online presence and equipment for remote work, meeting compliance timelines.

education_certification.credential: MD or DO degree with Board Certification in an approved ABMS Medical Specialty.
